text: Sir Peter Levin Shaffer (15 May 1926 - 6 June 2016) was an English playwright and screenwriter. He was known for his works in Equus, Amadeus, Black Comedy, and in The Royal Hunt of the Sun. He won an Academy Award and a Golden Globe Award for Best Screenwriter. Shaffer died on 6 June 2016 at the age of 90 while on a trip to the southwest of Ireland. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1926 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Academy Award winning writers Category:English playwrights Category:English screenwriters Category:Golden Globe Award winners Category:Writers from Liverpool
